1271350.name: Terminal Singularity - Unit Customization
1271350.description:
The Unit Customization DLC allows you to create a distinct and memorable personal look for each of your units in Terminal Singularity. You can customize every single tile of your units with a special color, an animated effect and even an image (texture) of your choice to create a design that is uniquely YOU!

  • Create and store up to 50 different designs for each of your units
  • Create your own gallery of up to 100 textures to apply to tiles
  • Choose between four base materials for your tile designs
  • Add spin, movement and flash effects to your designs
  • Ensure a perfect fit for your custom images with the texture-manipulation tools
  • Quickly copy designs between tiles with the copy and paste tools

IMPORTANT DISCLAIMER: Custom coloring and animated effects will be visible to both players. However, due to concerns about inappropriate content, your opponent will never see any custom images (textures) that you have applied to your units - these will be only visible to you and you alone. Furthermore, your opponent will also have the option to display your units with default designs on their end, if they choose to do so.

Please consider this information before buying.
1271350.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
